SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = Object():GetTargetPlayer() local source = EffectSource() local damage = GetObjectX() if source == nil then source = Object() end if damage > 4 then if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamageFullParams(damage, source, 0, 1 ) elseif ( target_player ~= nil ) then target_player:DealDamageFullParams(damage, source, 0, 1 ) end else if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamage(damage, source) elseif ( target_player ~= nil ) then target_player:DealDamage(damage, source) end end
